search.query: index=main sourcetype=aws-evidentio OR sourcetype=aws:evidentio | spath input=Records{}.Sns.Message | search "data.attributes.resource"="$form.resource$" | mvexpand included{}.attributes.name | rename "included{}.attributes.name" AS "Team and Description" | table "Team and Description" | head 2

table.title: Click the Identifier for the resolution steps

search.query: index=main sourcetype=aws-evidentio OR sourcetype=aws:evidentio | spath input=Records{}.Sns.Message | search "data.attributes.resource"="$form.resource$" | rename data.attributes.status AS "Status" data.attributes.risk_level AS "Risk Level" included{}.attributes.data.details.message AS "Details" included{}.attributes.identifier AS "Identifier" | dedup "Identifier" | table "Status" "Risk Level" "Details" "Identifier" | sort "Risk Level"

index=main sourcetype=aws-evidentio OR sourcetype=aws:evidentio | spath input=Records{}.Sns.Message | search "included{}.attributes.identifier"="$Identifier$" | rename included{}.attributes.description AS "Description" included{}.attributes.resolution AS "Resolution" | dedup "Resolution" | table "Description" "Resolution"

index=main sourcetype=aws-evidentio OR sourcetype=aws:evidentio | spath input=Records{}.Sns.Message | search "data.attributes.resource"="$form.resource$" | stats values(included{}.attributes.raw_event.*) | transpose | rename "row 1" AS "Event" | eval data=split(column,".") | eval Value=mvindex(data,-1) | eval Policy=mvindex(data,4) | table Value Policy Event

index=main sourcetype=aws-evidentio OR sourcetype=aws:evidentio | spath input=Records{}.Sns.Message | search "data.attributes.resource"="DucaMigrationTest" | stats values(included{}.relationships.*) | transpose | rename "row 1" AS "Link" | eval data=split(column,".") | eval Value=mvindex(data,2) | table Value Link

index=main sourcetype=aws-evidentio OR sourcetype=aws:evidentio source="http:Evident.io" | spath input=Records{}.Sns.Message | search"data.attributes.resource"="$form.resource$" | stats values(included{}.attributes.data.details.*) | transpose | rename "row 1" AS "Event" | eval data=split(column,".") | eval Bucket_Data=mvindex(data,1) | eval Policy=mvindex(data,4) | table Policy Event
